name: simprim

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(wi(w0, wn(w1))), w1)
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w1))

comment: Simplification. Similar to Theorem *3.27 (Simp) of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 112. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jan-1993.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 13-Nov-2012.)
